fields.description: Holds Reference_ID of Job Profile Succession Plan.
Holds Succession Plan Name attribute value.
Holds Succession Plan Description attribute value.
Holds Succession Plan Inactivate boolean value.
Restricted Succession pool holds a boolean value. This Boolean value is used to specify if the succession plan is restricted or not.
This Boolean value is used to specify if the Succession/Talent pool will be excluded from processing during the Remove Worker from Talent business process
Holds Job Profile reference for this succession plan.
Holds Reference to Succession Pool Candidate instance.

Description.description: Holds Succession Plan Description attribute value.

Exclude_from_Termination.description: This Boolean value is used to specify if the Succession/Talent pool will be excluded from processing during the Remove Worker from Talent business process

ID.description: Holds Reference_ID of Job Profile Succession Plan.

Inactive.description: Holds Succession Plan Inactivate boolean value.

Job_Profile_Reference.description: Holds Job Profile reference for this succession plan.

Name.description: Holds Succession Plan Name attribute value.

Restricted_View.description: Restricted Succession pool holds a boolean value. This Boolean value is used to specify if the succession plan is restricted or not.

Succession_Pool_Candidate.description: Holds Reference to Succession Pool Candidate instance.
